original: chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / rtag tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / yongs su dpyod pa la zhugs pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bzhi ni nges par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / rtag tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / yongs su dpyod pa la zhugs pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bzhi ni nges par rtog pa'o //
translated: The mental attention that is always engaged is intention.🔽The mental attention that is always

original: de la phung po lnga la sogs pa ji snyed yod pa shes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la phung po lnga la sogs pa ji snyed yod pa shes pa ni rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the extent of the five aggregates, etc. is discernment.

original: 'di thams cad stong pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du yod par shes pa ni /🔽@157b rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di thams cad stong pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du yod par shes pa ni / @157b rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of their existence as they are, as empty, etc. is thorough discernment.

original: shes rab dang bcas pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyis mtshan mar byed pa ni yongs su rtog pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang bcas pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i yid kyis mtshan mar byed pa ni yongs su rtog pa'o //
translated: The mental attention to their signs by the nondiscursive mind accompanied by wisdom is thorough examination.

original: nges par rtog pa ni yongs su dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: nges par rtog pa ni yongs su dpyod pa ste /
translated: The ascertainment of their signs is thorough analysis.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: This is the nature of the path of meditation.

original: rnam pas rnam pa dgur bzhed do //
analyzed: rnam pas rnam pa dgur bzhed do //
translated: It is considered to have nine aspects by way of its categories.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam de ni rnam pa'i dbye bas rnam pa dgur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam de ni rnam pa'i dbye bas rnam pa dgur 'gyur ro //
translated: This path of meditation is ninefold by way of its categories.

original: yang zhes bya bas mthun pa'i phyogs kyang rnam pa dgu'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya bas mthun pa'i phyogs kyang rnam pa dgu'o //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the categories of its favorable factors are also ninefold.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?🔽Therefore he says:

original: de'i phyir / chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams //
analyzed: de'i phyir / chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams //
translated: The small, medium, and great

original: chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: are divided into small of the small, etc.🔽The small, medium, and great roots of the favorable are each divided into three by way of the small, medium, and great.

original: chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chen po ste /
analyzed: chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang / chen po'i chen po ste /
translated: the small of the small, the medium of the small, the great of the small, the small of the medium, the medium of the medium, the great of the medium, the small of the great, the medium of the great, and the great of the great.

original: des na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang rnam pa dgu nyid do //
analyzed: des na mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyang rnam pa dgu nyid do //
translated: Thus, the counteragents also have nine aspects.

original: de la lam nyid kyi rnam pa ni rjes su mthun par skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la lam nyid kyi rnam pa ni rjes su mthun par skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The aspects of the path arise in a concordant manner.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dag ni mi mthun par 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dag ni mi mthun par 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The counteragents cease in a discordant manner.

original: chen po'i chen po dang / chen po'i 'bring nas /
analyzed: chen po'i chen po dang / chen po'i 'bring nas /
translated: From the great of the great down to

original: chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du'o //
analyzed: chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du'o //
translated: the small of the small.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs de yang bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs de yang bsgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba ste /
translated: These counteragents are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //🔽ci rigs par dri ma rags par sngar bsal nas /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // ci rigs par dri ma rags par sngar bsal nas /
translated: They are the conceptualizations of the passions.🔽In the appropriate order, the coarse stains are removed first,

original: phyi nas phra ba sel to //
analyzed: phyi nas phra ba sel to //
translated: and later the subtle ones.

original: de bzhin du sems kyi yang yin te //
analyzed: de bzhin du sems kyi yang yin te //
translated: So also is the mind.

original: de la dang po ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: de la dang po ni de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: The first is stated by “thus” and so on.

original: gnyis pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: The second is taught by “thus” and so on.

original: de nas lnga ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba lnga nas ches mang du bskyed do zhes bya ba lnga'i bar gyis gsungs so //🔽da nas gnyis ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba gcig nas /
analyzed: de nas lnga ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba lnga nas ches mang du bskyed do zhes bya ba lnga'i bar gyis gsungs so // da nas gnyis ni gzhan yang zhes bya ba gcig nas /
translated: Then the next five are stated by “Furthermore” and so on up to “generates even more.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: Then the next two are stated by “Furthermore” and so on up to “Subhūti said.”

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: “Thus” means in the manner stated.

original: bsgrub pa na zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyis so //🔽nye bar sems pa na zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gis so ;
analyzed: bsgrub pa na zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyis so // nye bar sems pa na zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gis so ;
translated: “When accomplishing” means by means of serenity.🔽“When reflecting” means by means of insight.

original: / yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga dag gis so //
analyzed: / yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga dag gis so //
translated: “When investigating” means by means of both.

original: rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas la sogs pas so //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas la sogs pas so //
translated: “When applying” means by means of serenity and so on.

original: rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong la brtson pas so //
analyzed: rtsol ba zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong la brtson pas so //
translated: “Exertion” is the effort in insight.

original: 'bad par byed pa ni gnyi ga la brtson pas so //
analyzed: 'bad par byed pa ni gnyi ga la brtson pas so //
translated: “Striving” is the effort in both.

original: bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis dris pa ni las ci tsam @158a * //🔽zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis dris pa ni las ci tsam @158a * // zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One himself asks, “What work does it do?”

original: nyid kyis lan bka' stsal pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nyid kyis lan bka' stsal pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: He himself answers, “It is like this:”

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “For example,” and so on.

original: dang po'i don du 'gyur ba ni mdzes ba'o //
analyzed: dang po'i don du 'gyur ba ni mdzes ba'o //
translated: The first meaning is “beautiful.”

original: gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang ngo //
translated: “Belonging to another” is dependent.

original: dbang med pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dbang med pa zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa'o //
translated: “Powerless” means without ability.

original: 'khor ba la zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rgyun 'byung ba la'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba la zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rgyun 'byung ba la'o //
translated: “In cyclic existence” means in the arising of the continuum of birth.

original: 'dor ba zhes bya ba ni spangs pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dor ba zhes bya ba ni spangs pa la'o //
translated: “Abandoning” means relinquishing.

original: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa mi 'byung pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa mi 'byung pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Turning away” is because the future does not arise.

original: mthar 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: mthar 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar 'byin par byed do //
translated: “It brings to an end” means it brings to an end the prior end and the later end.

original: ji skad gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Just as it is taught” is as before.

original: ji ltar bshad pa dang / ji ltar nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa dang / ji ltar nye bar bstan pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang bstan pa'o //
translated: “Just as it is explained and just as it is demonstrated” is the explanation and demonstration.

original: slob pa ni zhi gnas la'o //🔽rtog pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
analyzed: slob pa ni zhi gnas la'o // rtog pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
translated: “The trainee” is for śamatha.🔽“The thinker” is for vipaśyanā.

original: nye bar sems pa ni gnyi gas so //
analyzed: nye bar sems pa ni gnyi gas so //
translated: “The one who reflects” is for both.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa ni bsgom pa la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa ni bsgom pa la zhugs pa'o //
translated: Thus, one who practices yoga is engaged in meditation.

original: 'di tsam gyis ni las gcig bstan to //🔽gnyis pa ni nyes pa gang dag gis zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis ni las gcig bstan to // gnyis pa ni nyes pa gang dag gis zhes bya ba nas /
translated: This much teaches one activity.

original: rnam par spong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
analyzed: rnam par spong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs te /
translated: The second is from “whatever faults” up to “completely abandon them.”

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
translated: This is the small of the small of the path of meditation.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: “Subhūti, thus…” and so on.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa bzhin no //
translated: “Thus” is as just explained.

original: las ji tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskal pa shin tu mang po'i mthar phyin par byed pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i nyes pa spong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: las ji tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskal pa shin tu mang po'i mthar phyin par byed pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i nyes pa spong bar byed pa'o //
translated: As to the question, “How much karma?” and so on, it is to be completed at the end of a very long eon, and it is to eliminate the fault of turning away from perfect complete enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes bya ba nas khyad du 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni khyad par du gsungs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes bya ba nas khyad du 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni khyad par du gsungs te /
translated: “The bodhisattva who…” and so on up to “is superior” is the special explanation.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni sbyin par byed pas so //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni sbyin par byed pas so //
translated: “Therefore” is because of the giving.

original: 'di nyid khyad du 'phags pa ni bsod nams mang pos khyad du 'phags so //
analyzed: 'di nyid khyad du 'phags pa ni bsod nams mang pos khyad du 'phags so //
translated: This is the superiority, superior by way of much merit.

original: gang zhe na de'i phyir gang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gang zhe na de'i phyir gang 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: What is that? Therefore it is said, “This” and so on.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
translated: This is the medium of the small of the path of cultivation.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sbyin pa ni gtong pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la sbyin pa ni gtong pa'o //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti and so on. Giving is letting go.

original: rab tu 'god pa zhes bya ba ni yid la gcags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'god pa zhes bya ba ni yid la gcags pa med pa'o //
translated: “Establishing” is without regret.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi chung ngu'i chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi chung ngu'i chen po'o //
translated: This is the great of the small on the path of cultivation.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, etc.

original: yid la byed pa ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa ni gnas pa'o //
translated: Mental attention is the basis.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
translated: This is the small of the medium on the path of cultivation.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis ni @158b rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis ni @158b rtogs sla'o //
translated: The two beginning with Moreover, Subhūti, etc. are easy to understand.

original: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang rab 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, etc.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba'o //
translated: That gift of Dharma is dedicated by the dedication taught in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chung ngu'o //
translated: This is the small of the great on the path of cultivation.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, etc.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsgo zhing /
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsgo zhing /
translated: That gift of Dharma is dedicated by the dedication taught in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsngos nas yang nang du yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsngos nas yang nang du yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du byed pa'o //
translated: Having dedicated, one practices yoga in inner correct placement.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i 'bring ngo //
translated: This is the medium of the great path of cultivation.

original: gang yang de nang du yang dag 'jog pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o //
analyzed: gang yang de nang du yang dag 'jog pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the meditative equipoise is not separate from the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam chen po'i chen po'o //
translated: This is the great of the great path of cultivation.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
translated: Subhūti said, as stated.

original: 'dir bsod nams mang du bskyed do zhes mang du gsungs pa la /
analyzed: 'dir bsod nams mang du bskyed do zhes mang du gsungs pa la /
translated: Here, it is said many times that much merit is produced.

original: de'i phyir rab 'byor gyi dri ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab 'byor gyi dri ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti's question is: Manifest activity is conceptualization,

original: de bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa yang rnam par rtog pas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa yang rnam par rtog pas te /
translated: and likewise, the manifest activity of merit is also conceptualization.

original: de'i phyir bsod nams ches mang ba yang rtog pa ches mang ngo zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsod nams ches mang ba yang rtog pa ches mang ngo zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it would be said that the greater the merit, the greater the conceptualization.

original: lan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba ni /
analyzed: lan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba ni /
translated: The answer given by the Blessed One is:

original: rab 'byor zhes bya ba nas dpag tu med pa bskyed do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor zhes bya ba nas dpag tu med pa bskyed do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: Subhūti, up to generating immeasurable merit.

original: 'dir bsgom pa'i lam mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir stong pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir bsgom pa'i lam mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir stong pa ste /
translated: Here, the path of cultivation is empty because it does not exist as it is characterized.

original: byis pas mi shes pa ni stong ba'o //
analyzed: byis pas mi shes pa ni stong ba'o //
translated: The childish do not understand it, so it is empty.

original: kho na ni nyid do //
analyzed: kho na ni nyid do //
translated: The word “only” means “just that”.

original: de bzhin du snang ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Similarly, in “appearance”,

original: rab tu snang ba ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu snang ba ni snang ba'o //
translated: “appearance” means “illumination”.

original: mi snang ba las snang bar 'gyur ba ni snang ba ste /
analyzed: mi snang ba las snang bar 'gyur ba ni snang ba ste /
translated: It is an appearance because it appears from non-appearance.

original: rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is “illumination”.

original: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the following.

original: bdag po med pa'i phyir gsog go //
analyzed: bdag po med pa'i phyir gsog go //
translated: It is hollow because it has no owner.

original: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gsob bo //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gsob bo //
translated: It is false because it cannot be grasped.

original: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir snying po med pa'o //
translated: It is insubstantial because it cannot grasp.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni snying po nyid la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni snying po nyid la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Thus” means in terms of insubstantiality, etc.

original: lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed pa dris pa'i lan no ;
analyzed: bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed pa dris pa'i lan no ;
translated: This is the answer to the question about the production of immeasurable merit.

original: / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khyad par ni bye brag go //
analyzed: / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khyad par ni bye brag go //
translated: “Subhūti said” and so on. Distinctions are differences.

original: rnam par bcad pa ni tha dad pa ni tha dad du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa ni tha dad pa ni tha dad du byed pa'o //
translated: Exclusion is the differentiation of the different.

original: de dag rnam par bcad pa'i don du gnyi ga gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag rnam par bcad pa'i don du gnyi ga gzung ba yin no //
translated: For the sake of excluding those, both are apprehended.

original: tshad med ces bya ba ni rags pa yongs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med ces bya ba ni rags pa yongs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The term immeasurable is the exclusion of the gross.

original: grangs ni bgrang ba'o //🔽zad @159a * //
analyzed: grangs ni bgrang ba'o // zad @159a * //
translated: Number is counting.

original: par mi nus pa ni mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: par mi nus pa ni mi zad pa'o //
translated: The term inexhaustible is non-exhaustion.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang gzugs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang gzugs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs sla'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, Those who see form... and so on. This is easy to understand.

original: lhag ma'i tshig ni tshig bla dags te tshig gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhag ma'i tshig ni tshig bla dags te tshig gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The remaining words are synonyms, meaning the principal words.

original: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The term inexhaustible is like space.

original: dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba yang nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba yang nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: The term immeasurable is also like space.

original: chos de dag ni zhes bya ba ni mi zad pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos de dag ni zhes bya ba ni mi zad pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term those dharmas refers to the inexhaustible, immeasurable, empty, signless, and so on.

original: brjod pa ni sgra dang 'dra ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa ni sgra dang 'dra ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: Expression is like sound, and also various kinds.

original: de ltar na don gcig yin yang cha yis rnam par bcad pa tha dad do zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de ltar na don gcig yin yang cha yis rnam par bcad pa tha dad do zhes dgongs so //
translated: Thus, although the meaning is the same, the divisions are different.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir ni bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir ni bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: That is why the treatise declares, “The establishment of the teaching.

original: bstan pa ni 'dis bstan pas na bstan pa ste /
analyzed: bstan pa ni 'dis bstan pas na bstan pa ste /
translated: ” The teaching is that which is taught by this, i.e., compassion.

original: snying rje'o // de mngon par bsgrub pa ni rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje'o // de mngon par bsgrub pa ni rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: Its establishment is the natural outcome.

original: de yang yin bstan pa yang yin pas na bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de yang yin bstan pa yang yin pas na bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is both the teaching and the establishment of the teaching.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, the treatise declares,

original: grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams //
analyzed: grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams //
translated: “The teachings of incalculable aeons, etc.,

original: dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin //🔽kun rdzob de dag thugs brtse ba'i //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin // kun rdzob de dag thugs brtse ba'i //
translated: are not for the ultimate.🔽The Sage considers them to be the natural outcome

original: rgyu mthun gyur par thub pa bzhed //
analyzed: rgyu mthun gyur par thub pa bzhed //
translated: of his compassion, which is conventional.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te bzod ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te bzod ma yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs pa'o //
translated: ” “Not for the ultimate” means not reasonable.

original: de ni grangs med pa la sogs pa bstan pas rgol ba'i lan no //
analyzed: de ni grangs med pa la sogs pa bstan pas rgol ba'i lan no //
translated: This is the response to the objection that the teaching of incalculable aeons, etc., is unreasonable.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba nas mod kyi 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes bya ba nas mod kyi 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la //
translated: Subhūti said...

original: brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni gang gi spyod yul lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba ni gang gi spyod yul lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unutterable means that it is not the domain of anyone.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The meaning of the perfection of wisdom means the characteristic of emptiness.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, the treatise states:

original: dngos po brjod du med pa las /
analyzed: dngos po brjod du med pa las /
translated: In the unutterable thing,

original: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi rung //
analyzed: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi rung //
translated: deficiency and increase are not possible.

original: bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //🔽ci zhig nyams shing ci zhig 'thob //
analyzed: bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni // ci zhig nyams shing ci zhig 'thob //
translated: By the path called 'cultivation,'

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: what is deficient and what is obtained?

original: 'di ni brjod du med pa la nyams pa dang / 'phel ba med pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brjod du med pa la nyams pa dang / 'phel ba med pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: This is the unutterable thing, where deficiency and increase are not possible.

original: 'o na ji ltar byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how is enlightenment attained?

original: de'i phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba nas le'u rdzogs kyi bar du gsungs pa la de sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing yid la byed pa de dag dang sems bskyed pa de dag ces bya ba ni gang gis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba nas le'u rdzogs kyi bar du gsungs pa la de sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing yid la byed pa de dag dang sems bskyed pa de dag ces bya ba ni gang gis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the passage from “but” up to the end of the chapter is stated. “He gives gifts, and those mental attentions and those productions of the thought” are those by which one gives gifts.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ces bya ba ni gang sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ces bya ba ni gang sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Those wholesome roots” are those endowed with those productions of the thought.

original: byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du de ni 'dod pa'i don @159b du sngo bar byed do //
analyzed: byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du de ni 'dod pa'i don @159b du sngo bar byed do //
translated: “Enlightenment” is the object of his desire, and he dedicates in that way.

original: gzhan du na de'i yongs su bsngo bas byang chub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de'i yongs su bsngo bas byang chub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, his dedication would not lead to enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to the following.

original: ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba gsungs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba gsungs pa la /
translated: As for the statement “unsurpassed perfect enlightenment,”

original: de'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas dris so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas dris so //
translated: therefore, the question beginning “Then the Lord” is asked.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni de bzhin nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni de bzhin nyid de zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat has said, “Subhuti, this unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment is suchness.”

original: rgyun mi chad pa zhes bya ba ni yang nas yang du'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi chad pa zhes bya ba ni yang nas yang du'o //
translated: “Without interruption” means again and again.

original: mang du zhes bya ba ni rgyun du'o //
analyzed: mang du zhes bya ba ni rgyun du'o //
translated: “Much” means continuously.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: “Thus” and so on concludes.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las /
translated: Here, the treatise states:

original: byang chub ji ltar de bzhin du //
analyzed: byang chub ji ltar de bzhin du //
translated: Enlightenment is just like that.

original: 'di nyid 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed //
analyzed: 'di nyid 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed //
translated: This is the means of accomplishing the desired goal.

original: byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid //🔽de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed //
analyzed: byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid // de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed //
translated: Enlightenment is characterized by suchness.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: That is also accepted as its characteristic.

original: de dang de'i zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: de dang de'i zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam mo //
translated: Here, “that and that” refers to the path of cultivation.

original: stong pa nyid gtso bor ston pa'i le'u ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gtso bor ston pa'i le'u ni stong pa nyid kyi le'u'o //
translated: The chapter that primarily teaches emptiness is the chapter on emptiness.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines Commentary

original: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u bcva brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas rnam par sbyar ba snying po mchog ces bya ba las le'u bcva brgyad pa'o /
translated: The eighteenth chapter of the Supreme Essence Tantra, composed by the master Ratnākaraśānti, is complete.

original: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to Mañjuśrī, the Youth...

original: sogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
analyzed: sogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /
translated: ... will be so-and-so.

original: sems snga ma dang / phyi ma de dag dang / byang chub 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
analyzed: sems snga ma dang / phyi ma de dag dang / byang chub 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
translated: The objection is: Because the former and latter minds are not connected with enlightenment.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba nas 'tshang yang rgya'o zhes bya ba de yan chad kyis ni mar me'i dpes lan btab pa'o //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba nas 'tshang yang rgya'o zhes bya ba de yan chad kyis ni mar me'i dpes lan btab pa'o //
translated: Having thus requested... up to will be fully enlightened. This is the reply using the example of the lamp.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /🔽sems ni snga mas byang chub par //
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las / sems ni snga mas byang chub par //
translated: Here, in the treatise:🔽Enlightenment is not by the former mind,

original: rigs min phyi mas kyang ma yin //
analyzed: rigs min phyi mas kyang ma yin //
translated: nor by the latter.

original: zhes bya ba'i rgol ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rgol ba'o //
translated: This is the objection.

original: mar me'i dpe'i tshul gyis ni byang chub pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mar me'i dpe'i tshul gyis ni byang chub pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Enlightenment is to be supplied.

original: 'di ni lan btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lan btab pa'o //
translated: This is the reply.

original: de nas bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de nas bstan bcos las /
translated: Then, in the treatise:

original: zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad //
translated: The profound reality has eight aspects.

original: byang chub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: enlightenment is to be supplied.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi byang chub 'ba' zhig le'u bco brgyad par bstan nas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi byang chub 'ba' zhig le'u bco brgyad par bstan nas /
translated: In the eighteenth chapter, only the enlightenment characterized by thusness is taught.

original: gang yang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa ni zab pa rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: gang yang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa ni zab pa rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: But the characteristic of enlightenment together with its retinue is the eight profundities.

original: de ji ltar rnam pa brgyad yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar rnam pa brgyad yin zhe na /
translated: How is it eightfold?🔽Arising and cessation,🔽thusness, the knowable,

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang // de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang / shes dang spyod yul gnyis med dang // @160a * //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang // de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang / shes dang spyod yul gnyis med dang // @160a * //
translated: knowledge, the nonduality of the two spheres,

original: thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid //
translated: and skill in liberative art.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: These are the eight profundities.

original: gnyis su med pa dang thabs la mkhas pa ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa dang thabs la mkhas pa ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye ba'o //
translated: Nonduality and skill in liberative art are counted as one profundity.

original: de'i phyir de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di zab lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rab 'byor gyis zab pa nyid kyi skabs ston par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di zab lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rab 'byor gyis zab pa nyid kyi skabs ston par byed do //
translated: Therefore, the passage beginning “When this had been said” and ending “this dependent origination is profound” shows Subhūti teaching the profundity of the topic.

original: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni de dag ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan las zhes bya ba ni de dag ma yin pa'o //
translated: From another, i.e., from that which is not that.

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Having thus been requested,

original: thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni zab pa rnam pa brgyad gsungs te /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni zab pa rnam pa brgyad gsungs te /
translated: up to skillful means.

original: sems gang zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtogs pa 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sems gang zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtogs pa 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The mind which is that, i.e., the imagination of what is unreal, which has the nature of error.

original: 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun zad pa'i phyir 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun zad pa'i phyir 'gag pa'o //
translated: Cessation is cessation due to the exhaustion of the stream.

original: ma lags pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa'i don te /
analyzed: ma lags pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa'i don te /
translated: Not so, i.e., it does not have the sense of not being.

original: 'khrul ba'i rgu gnyis su mngon par zhen pa zad pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i rgu gnyis su mngon par zhen pa zad pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: Because the error of the duality of subject and object is exhausted.

original: 'di ni skye ba zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni skye ba zad pa'o //
translated: This is the exhaustion of birth.

original: sems gang skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa ste /
analyzed: sems gang skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa med pa ste /
translated: The mind which is born is non-erroneous.

original: 'khrul pa chad pas sems la rag las pa nyid kyi phyir sems skye ba'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pa chad pas sems la rag las pa nyid kyi phyir sems skye ba'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: Because it is dependent on the mind, the mind is born, due to the cessation of error.

original: 'gag pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma re re la zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'gag pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma re re la zhes dgongs so //
translated: It has the nature of cessation, i.e., in every moment.

original: 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun 'gag pa zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun 'gag pa zhes dgongs so //
translated: “Cessation” is the cessation of the continuum.

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis skye ba ste /
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis skye ba ste /
translated: “No” means that it arises by itself.

original: smon lam la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bcas pas 'gag pa med par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: smon lam la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bcas pas 'gag pa med par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is not made to cease by the special prayers, etc.

original: sems gang ma byung zhes bya ba ni skye ba zab pa gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sems gang ma byung zhes bya ba ni skye ba zab pa gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: “The mind that has not arisen” is the profound arising that was mentioned.

original: gang 'gag pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag par gang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'gag pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag par gang bstan pa'o //
translated: “That which has the nature of cessation” is what was just mentioned as “past.”

original: gang 'gag pa'i chos zhes 'dir yang brjod pa ni de bzlas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang 'gag pa'i chos zhes 'dir yang brjod pa ni de bzlas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “That which has the nature of cessation” is also mentioned here.

original: gang sems zhes bya ba ni gang sems kyi rgyun no //
analyzed: gang sems zhes bya ba ni gang sems kyi rgyun no //
translated: “The mind” is the continuum of the mind.

original: ma byung ma 'gags pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas so //
analyzed: ma byung ma 'gags pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas so //
translated: “That which has not arisen and not ceased” is without beginning or end.

original: chos gang zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par brjod pa'i 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: chos gang zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par brjod pa'i 'gog pa'o //
translated: “Any dharma” is the cessation that is called nirvana.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis 'gag pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'o //
translated: Cessation by its very nature means cessation by its intrinsic nature.

original: chos nyid ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos nyid ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The reality of things means their emptiness.

original: 'di ni 'gag pa zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'gag pa zab pa'o //
translated: This is the profundity of cessation.🔽Similarly, does it remain as long as space remains?

original: de bzhin du gnas sam zhes bya ba ni nam ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa de srid du de bzhin nyid ther zug par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas sam zhes bya ba ni nam ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa de srid du de bzhin nyid ther zug par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Or does suchness become permanent?

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “No.”

original: rgyun gyis brtags @160b pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: rgyun gyis brtags @160b pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: He means that it is imputed by a continuum.

original: de bzhin nyid zab ces bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyang phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid zab ces bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyang phra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The profundity of suchness is due to the subtlety of the knowledge of reality.

original: 'di ni de bzhin nyid zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin nyid zab pa'o //
translated: This is the profundity of suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid la sems yod dam zhes bya ba ni de shes pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rten yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la sems yod dam zhes bya ba ni de shes pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rten yin no //
translated: Does the mind exist in suchness?

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni shes pa las shes bya tha dad pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni shes pa las shes bya tha dad pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He says, “No,” because it is not logical that the object of knowledge is different from knowledge.

original: sems de de bzhin nyid yin nam zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems de de bzhin nyid yin nam zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Is the mind suchness?

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: Because of the identity of the characteristic.

original: de bzhin nyid las gud na yod dam zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las gud na yod dam zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Whether it exists apart from thusness or not is in terms of the difference in characteristics.

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: No, because of the difference in characteristics, but because of its identity with that.

original: de'i phyir gzung bar bya ba yin yang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzung bar bya ba yin yang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, although it is the object of apprehension, it is not called thusness.

original: 'di ni shes bya zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni shes bya zab pa'o //
translated: This is the profundity of the knowable.

original: yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam zhes bya ba ni sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam zhes bya ba ni sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: Whether it is seen correctly or not is in terms of the nature of mind.

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is not the apprehender.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dzin par byed pa ma yin yang sems ni rig par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dzin par byed pa ma yin yang sems ni rig par byed pa ste /
translated: Therefore, although it is not the apprehender, the mind is the knower.

original: 'di ni shes pa zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni shes pa zab pa'o //
translated: This is the profundity of consciousness.

original: zab mo la spyod dam zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: zab mo la spyod dam zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la'o //
translated: Whether one practices the profound or not is in terms of the meaning of the perfection of wisdom.

original: yongs su rgyu ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la'o //
analyzed: yongs su rgyu ba ni dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la'o //
translated: Wandering refers to the signs of the objective.

original: mi 'jug pa ni mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'jug pa ni mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: Non-engagement is non-occurrence.

original: rgyu bar 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni mi snang ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu bar 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni mi snang ba'o //
translated: Non-appearance is non-manifestation.

original: 'di ni spyod pa zab pa'o //🔽mtshan ma la spyod dam zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi mtshan ma 'am /
analyzed: 'di ni spyod pa zab pa'o // mtshan ma la spyod dam zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi mtshan ma 'am /
translated: This is the profound practice.

original: gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma la'o //
analyzed: gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma la'o //
translated: The phrase practicing with signs refers to the signs of duality or the signs of non-duality.

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi mtshan ma med pa dang / gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi mtshan ma med pa dang / gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: The phrase not practicing refers to the absence of the signs of duality and the absence of the signs of non-duality.

original: mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: The word signs refers to the signs of duality and the signs of non-duality.

original: ma bsgoms sam zhes bya ba ni ma spangs pa'o //
analyzed: ma bsgoms sam zhes bya ba ni ma spangs pa'o //
translated: The phrase not cultivated means not abandoned.

original: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni spangs pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: ma lags so zhes bya ba ni spangs pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The phrase not so means abandoned.

original: 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i zab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i zab pa'o //
translated: This is the profundity of non-duality.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang ngo //
translated: The phrase how is it means in what way.

original: mtshan ma rnam par bshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: mtshan ma rnam par bshig par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The phrase destroying signs means not perfecting all the qualities of a Buddha.

original: rab 'byor gyis lan gsol pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis lan gsol pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Subhuti's reply is stated from The Lord has said...

original: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni skye ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni skye ba nyid du'o //
translated: Here itself means in the very birth.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Why? is stated from If, on the other hand...

original: nyan thos su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Would become a Sravaka means would not become a perfect Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das @161a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @161a * //
translated: The Lord...

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: and so on is the conclusion.

original: mtshan nyid gang lags pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni gang chos kyi mtshan ma dang / gang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma de thams cad shes pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang lags pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni gang chos kyi mtshan ma dang / gang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma de thams cad shes pa'o //
translated: The sign of the characteristics is the knowledge of all the signs of dharmas and the signs of the nature of dharmas.

original: yongs su 'dris pa ni goms pa tsam byed pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su 'dris pa ni goms pa tsam byed pa'o //
translated: Familiarity is merely making oneself accustomed.

original: 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i zab pa'o //🔽de la zab pa brgyad ni byang chub dang rgyang ring ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i zab pa'o // de la zab pa brgyad ni byang chub dang rgyang ring ba yin la /
translated: This is the profundity of skill in means.🔽Therein, the eight profundities are distant from enlightenment,

original: lhag ma ni nye ba yin no zhes zab pa brgyad bstan to //
analyzed: lhag ma ni nye ba yin no zhes zab pa brgyad bstan to //
translated: while the remaining ones are near. Thus the eight profundities are taught.

original: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs bstan nas /
analyzed: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the assembly of learners who are irreversible,

original: srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid brjod par bya ste /
translated: the sameness of existence and peace should be expressed.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
translated: Therefore, the treatise declares:

original: chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir //
analyzed: chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir //
translated: Since phenomena are like dreams,

original: srid pa zhi ba mi rtog pa //
analyzed: srid pa zhi ba mi rtog pa //
translated: existence and peace are nonconceptual.

original: zhes gsungs pa la 'di ni 'khor ba dang / 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes tha dad par brtags pa 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa bsgom pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa la 'di ni 'khor ba dang / 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes tha dad par brtags pa 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa bsgom pa'i lam ste /
translated: This is the path of meditation that knows the sameness of cyclic existence and nirvana, since they are imagined to be different, thinking “this is cyclic existence” and “this is nirvana.”

original: de dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur mthong ngo //
translated: Since they are not observed, all phenomena are seen to be like dreams.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa ni 'khor ba yin par der yang 'khrul pa tsam ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa ni 'khor ba yin par der yang 'khrul pa tsam ste /
translated: Since the imagination of what is unreal is cyclic existence, it is merely an error.

original: 'khrul pa zad na mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin nam gang gi tshe de dag mnyam pa nyid du shes /
analyzed: 'khrul pa zad na mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin nam gang gi tshe de dag mnyam pa nyid du shes /
translated: If error is exhausted, is it not nirvana? When are they known to be the same?

original: gal te bsgom pa'i lam mngon du gyur pa na chos thams cad bdag med par yang dag par shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bsgom pa'i lam mngon du gyur pa na chos thams cad bdag med par yang dag par shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that when the path of cultivation is manifest, it is the correct knowledge of the selflessness of all phenomena and so on,

original: 'di ni mthong ba'i lam la yang med na de las bsgom pa'i lam khyad par ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'di ni mthong ba'i lam la yang med na de las bsgom pa'i lam khyad par ci zhig yod /
translated: then since this is not even on the path of seeing, what difference is there between it and the path of cultivation?

original: de bas na de la khyab pas de ni mnyam pa nyid du shes par gzung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na de la khyab pas de ni mnyam pa nyid du shes par gzung ngo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since it pervades that, it should be understood as sameness.

original: de yang mi dmigs te ldang ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs te ldang ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa ste /
translated: That is also not observed, because the consciousness of arising is deluded,

original: rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir rmi lam mo //
analyzed: rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir rmi lam mo //
translated: because it is like a dream, it is a dream.

original: bsgom pa'i lam gyi yang dag pa'i ye shes ni nyin par dang 'dra ba ni nyid kyi phyir nyin par ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam gyi yang dag pa'i ye shes ni nyin par dang 'dra ba ni nyid kyi phyir nyin par ro //
translated: The correct wisdom of the path of cultivation is like the daytime, because it is like the daytime.

original: de gang gi tshe ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gi tshe ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: When does that occur?

original: nyin par khyad par du goms par gyur na /
analyzed: nyin par khyad par du goms par gyur na /
translated: When the daytime becomes particularly familiar,

original: rmi lam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel te /
analyzed: rmi lam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel te /
translated: the perfection of wisdom also increases in dreams.

original: de ni mdo las de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ni mdo las de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba nas /
translated: That is stated in the sutra: Then the venerable Shariputra...

original: rnam par 'phel lam zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dris so //
analyzed: rnam par 'phel lam zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dris so //
translated: The question is asked up to will it increase?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Subhūti said...

original: rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i len te /
analyzed: rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i len te /
translated: up to it will increase.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i khyad par te //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i khyad par te //
translated: Non-conceptuality is a special non-conceptuality,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa dang khyad par med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa dang khyad par med pa'o //
translated: without distinction of non-conceptuality.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @161b goms pa zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i lam la goms pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @161b goms pa zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i lam la goms pa'o //
translated: Cultivating the perfection of wisdom is cultivation on the path of cultivation.

original: 'dir ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'o //
translated: Here, it is the knowledge of the equality of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Śāriputra said... and so on.

original: 'dir rmi lam gyi sgras ni rmi lam nyid brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir rmi lam gyi sgras ni rmi lam nyid brjod do //
translated: Here, the word dream expresses the nature of a dream.

original: zad pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba la zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste ;
analyzed: zad pa'i 'du shes zhes bya ba la zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste ;
translated: The notion of exhaustion is the notion of nirvāṇa,

analyzed: log pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'o //

analyzed: sems dang sems pa dang / blo dang rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig go //

analyzed: dben pa zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o //

original: sems pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: sems pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs par sla'o //

analyzed: lus kyi mngon sum du zhes bya ba ni lus kyi rten no //

analyzed: de'i phyir log pa ni lus kyi mngon sum du gyur ba'o //

analyzed: lus kyang mngon sum du gyur pas don 'di zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //

analyzed: lan ldon par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lan 'debs par 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: chos gang lan ldon par byed pa zhes bya ba ni byams pa'o //

analyzed: lan glan par bya ba zhes bya ba ni dris pa'o //

original: chos gang gis zhes bya ba ni tshig go //
analyzed: chos gang gis zhes bya ba ni tshig go //

analyzed: chos gang gi zhes bya ba ni sh'a ri'i bu'i'o //

analyzed: skrag pa skyes pa ni skrag pa skyes pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag par skrag pa skyes pa ni dngang ba'o //

analyzed: skrag pa de rgyun skyes pa ni shin tu dngang ba'o //

analyzed: stobs bskyed pa ni bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bag chags so //

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /🔽las med la sogs klan ka yi ;
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las / las med la sogs klan ka yi ;
translated: Here, the treatise states:🔽The responses to objections

analyzed: / lan ni ji skad bshad par zad //

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: zhing dag pa bla na med pa brjod par bya ste /

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos las /

analyzed: sems can 'jig rten de bzhin du /

analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa //

analyzed: de la dag pa sgrub pa yis //

analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing ni dag pa nyid //

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: de dag pa ni yongs su dag pa'o //

original: de gang du 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de gang du 'byung zhe na /

analyzed: dag pa'i 'jig rten snang bar ro //

analyzed: chus sbangs pa'i dgon pa ni chu'i dgon pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos las /

analyzed: stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i yul lo //

analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas mngon sum du mi byed do zhes ba'i bar gyis gsungs pa la /

analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa la /

analyzed: dpa' ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //

analyzed: rtsal che ba ni spro ba'o //

analyzed: brtan pa ni rab tu gnas pa'o //

analyzed: spobs pa ni smra bar nus pa'o //

analyzed: nan tan ni bsgrub pa'o //

analyzed: rtogs pa chen po ni shes pa'o //

analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa ni mkhas pa'o //
